text:
[Verse]
Golden sky so bright
Fading into night
We chase the day away
In the last light's sway

[Verse 2]
Footprints in the sand
You hold my hand
Waves crash and play
In twilight’s gray

[Chorus]
Chasing sunsets
Oh so free
You and me
Where we wanna be
Colors blend in perfect art
End of day
Fresh start

[Verse 3]
Stars begin to glow
Night takes control
We dance in the dark
Fireworks spark

[Bridge]
Underneath the endless sky
Don't need a reason why
Just you and me tonight
Feels so right

[Verse 4]
Hear the whispering breeze
Feel the gentle ease
Moments drift away
Endless summer stays
title: Chasing Sunsets
